column4: i looked up theproblem and they said that you should- add a specific command lin- update Bios- add to boot line (from older advice)- replace Karmic with earlier version (but some of these had same bugs)roll back to an earlier version of Firefox- hope that Ubuntu finds a fix to this bug
i had a problem with touchpad on 9.04--purging xorg-xserver-input-synaptics was the solution
